alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Grant; Richland; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 10:42PM CST until January 23 at 3:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Slippery Conditions Into The Overnight... .Light snow continued to fall across the area late this evening and roads remain snow covered and slippery. The snow will begin to taper off across parts of southeast Minnesota and northeast Iowa around midnight and end early Sunday morning across the rest of the area. Total accumulations are still expected to be in the 2 to 5 inch range. If traveling, be prepared for slippery conditions through the night. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Wisconsin, north central and northeast Iowa and southeast Minnesota. * WHEN...Until 3 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, check 511ia.org in Iowa, 511mn.org in Minnesota, and 511wi.gov in Wisconsin.
